# Prepare Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
data("fhch2010", package = "afex")

library("tidyverse")

fhch <- as_tibble(fhch2010) %>% 
  filter(correct)

fhch2 <- fhch %>% 
  group_by(id, stimulus) %>% 
  nest() %>% 
  mutate(samp = map(data, ~.[1:5,])) %>% 
  select(id, stimulus, samp) %>% 
  unnest()

```
